Elige el plan que hará: Choose the plan that will make
En Tlacualli App, creemos que la tecnolo: At Tlacualli App, we believe technology should be accessible to everyone. That's why we've designed plans that perfectly fit the size of your restaurant, helping you manage your business efficiently, without complications, and at a fair price.

¿Aún no estás seguro? No te preocupes. T: Not sure yet? Don't worry. We invite you to try all the features of Tlacualli App at no cost. No credit card or commitments required. Explore how our tool can transform your restaurant management and discover why thousands of businesses trust us.

Tu libertad es importante. Por eso, pued: Your freedom is important. That's why you can cancel your subscription at any time, with no questions or penalties.
¿Cómo funcionan los 15 días de prueba gr: How does the 15-day free trial work?
Simplemente regístrate y tendrás acceso: Simply sign up and you'll have access to all the features of the Pro Plan for 15 days, without needing to enter a credit card. At the end of the period, you can choose the plan that best suits you.
¿Puedo cambiar de plan en cualquier mome: Can I change my plan at any time?
¡Sí! Puedes cambiar de plan, ya sea para: Yes! You can change your plan, whether to upgrade or downgrade your services, at any time from your account's settings panel. The change will be applied to your next billing cycle.
¿Los precios mostrados incluyen el IVA?: Do the displayed prices include VAT?
Los precios mostrados son más IVA. El im: The displayed prices are plus VAT. The tax will be itemized on your invoice at the time of payment.
¿Qué formas de pago aceptan?: What payment methods do you accept?
Aceptamos las principales tarjetas de cr: We accept all major credit and debit cards. The entire payment process is secure and encrypted.
No. En Tlacualli App creemos en la flexi: No. At Tlacualli App, we believe in flexibility. You can cancel your subscription at any time, without penalties or long-term contracts.
